SEARCH
Package arc

Class TextOutputFile

java.lang.Object
arc.TextOutputFile
public class TextOutputFile extends Object

ARC TextOutputFile

This class allows you to open up a text file for writing

Since:
2017-04-20

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    TextOutputFile(String strFileName)
    Open a text file for writing based on an input file name
    TextOutputFile(String strFileName, boolean blnAppend)
    Open a text file for writing based on an input file name

  • Constructor Details

    • TextOutputFile

      public TextOutputFile(String strFileName)
      Open a text file for writing based on an input file name
      Parameters:
      strFileName - name of the file you would like to open for writing overwritting any old data in the file

    • TextOutputFile

      public TextOutputFile(String strFileName, boolean blnAppend)
      Open a text file for writing based on an input file name
      Parameters:
      strFileName - name of the file you would like to open for writing
      blnAppend - will determine if any new data will be appended (true) or overwritten (false)
